lines.setup: O'Brien completes the transporter adjustments, just in time for the guests to arrive. O'Brien glances at his watch, 'It's 17:00 hours somewhere,' he shrugs. Time to get this party started.
lines.responding_to_replicator_creation_succes: Very nice. A perfectly mixed Finagle's Folly
lines.move_on_to_next_episode: Congratulations! You may now move on to the next episode.
lines.responding_to_nothing_on_replicator_plat: There's nothing for me to drink!
